title: new client visual yeah whatever it is
body:
doesn't it look like someone just took a turd and wiped it across my screen oh that's the new client. yeah what were they thinking. looks like a 2 year old did this but got bored half way though so left if for a blind person to finish

jhow hard is it to release a working client. you don't need clients that are bigger than the game itself. problem we have now. games freeze in champselcet but not in game because client so massively oversized
